name: go-guru
author: Jean-Nicolas Moal <jn.moal@gmail.com> (https://github.com/jnmoal)
description: A package that calls the guru tool and prints out its output. Still in development.

guruUserScope.title: scope
guruUserScope.description: Element in this comma separated list will be passed to the guru tool as -scope argument.

guruComputeScope.title: Include atom project
guruComputeScope.description: This will add the atom project's root directory to the scope.
